title: Rate law from rate law fast equil and rxn mech

content.question:
Step 1: 

<math alttext="2 N O is in equilibrium with open parenthesis N O close parenthesis 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>⁢</mo><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>NO</mtext><mo>⇄</mo><msub><mrow><mtext>(NO)</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>2</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> 
(fast) 

Step 2: 

<math alttext="open parenthesis N O close parenthesis 2 plus O 2 is in equilibrium with 2 N O 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mtext>NO)</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>O</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>⇄</mo><msub><mrow><mn>2</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>NO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></math> 
(slow) 

The elementary steps in a proposed mechanism for the reaction <math alttext="2 N O gas plus O 2 gas produces 2 N O 2 gas " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn><mtext> </mtext><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mstyle><mtext>NO</mtext></mstyle><mo>(</mo><mstyle mathvariant="italic"><mrow><mi>g</mi><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mo>)</mo><mo>+</mo></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>(</mo><mstyle mathvariant="italic"><mrow><mi>g</mi><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mo>)</mo><mo>→</mo><mn>2</mn><msub><mrow><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mstyle><mtext>NO</mtext></mstyle></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle><mo>(</mo><mstyle mathvariant="italic"><mrow><mi>g</mi><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> are represented by the equations above. Which of the following is the rate law for the overall reaction that is consistent with the proposed mechanism?

choices.label: <math alttext="rate equals k, times the molar concentration of N O squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mtext>rate</mtext><mo>=</mo><mi>k</mi><msup><mrow><mo stretchy="false">[</mo><mtext>NO</mtext><mo stretchy="false">]</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="rate equals k, times the molar concentration of N O, times the molar concentration of O 2 " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mtext>rate</mtext><mo>=</mo><mi>k</mi><mo stretchy="false">[</mo><mtext>NO</mtext><mo stretchy="false">]</mo><mo stretchy="false">[</mo><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>2</mtext></mrow></msub><mo stretchy="false">]</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="rate equals k, times the molar concentration of N O squared, times the molar concentration of O 2 " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mtext>rate</mtext><mo>=</mo><mi>k</mi><msup><mrow><mo stretchy="false">[</mo><mtext>NO</mtext><mo stretchy="false">]</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo stretchy="false">[</mo><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>2</mtext></mrow></msub><mo stretchy="false">]</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="rate equals k, times the molar concentration of open parenthesis N O close parenthesis 2, times the molar concentration of O 2 " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mtext>rate</mtext><mo>=</mo><mi>k</mi><mo stretchy="false">[</mo><msub><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mtext>NO)</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo stretchy="false">]</mo><mo stretchy="false">[</mo><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>2</mtext></mrow></msub><mo stretchy="false">]</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="rate equals k, times the molar concentration of N O squared, times the molar concentration of O 2 " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mtext>rate</mtext><mo>=</mo><mi>k</mi><msup><mrow><mo stretchy="false">[</mo><mtext>NO</mtext><mo stretchy="false">]</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo stretchy="false">[</mo><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>2</mtext></mrow></msub><mo stretchy="false">]</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 5.B: Identify an appropriate theory, definition, or mathematical relationship to solve a problem.
